name: Hunting Dagger: Common
description: A basic dagger, ideal for melee combat. Deals critical hits when behind your target.

name: Hunting Dagger: Uncommon
description: A sturdy dagger, ideal for melee combat. Deals critical hits when behind your target.

name: Hunting Dagger: Rare
description: A strong dagger, ideal for melee combat. Deals critical hits when behind your target.

name: Hunting Dagger: Epic
description: A powerful dagger, ideal for melee combat. Deals critical hits when behind your target.

name: Recurve Crossbow: Common
description: A basic crossbow, ideal for dealing with ranged enemies from afar.
flavour-text: Make your point from far away

name: Recurve Crossbow: Uncommon
description: A sturdy crossbow, ideal for dealing with ranged enemies from afar.

name: Recurve Crossbow: Rare
description: A strong crossbow, ideal for dealing with ranged enemies from afar.
flavour-text: Nock an arrow and knock off a few foes.

name: Recurve Crossbow: Epic
description: A powerful crossbow, ideal for dealing with ranged enemies from afar.

name: Knight Shield: Common
description: A simple shield that can be used to block incoming damage.

name: Knight Shield: Uncommon
description: A sturdy shield that can be used to block incoming damage.
flavour-text: Strong enough for your average battle.

name: Knight Shield: Rare
description: A strong shield that can be used to block incoming damage.

name: Knight Shield: Epic
description: A powerful shield that can be used to block incoming damage.

name: Shortsword
description: A basic sword, ideal for melee combat with enemies up-close.

name: Longsword: Uncommon
description: A sturdy sword, ideal for melee combat with enemies up-close.

name: Longsword: Rare
description: A strong sword, ideal for melee combat with enemies up-close.

name: Longsword: Epic
description: A powerful sword, ideal for melee combat with enemies up-close.

name: Dynamite
description: A powerful explosive.
flavour-text: Lob this to make whatever's in your way go to pieces.

name: Arrow
description: Ammo used for Crossbows.

name: Glider
description: Use to glide through the skies from high places.

name: Grappler
description: Launch a plunger and get pulled to your target.

name: Survival Compass
description: Adds navigation and map markers to the HUD.

name: Power Cell
description: Place then inside a Power Center to provide Power to your contraptions.
flavour-text: A lil' power in the palm of your hands.

name: Basic Compass
description: Adds basic navigation to the HUD.

name: Spyglass
description: A telescopic tool that magnifies distant views.

name: Torch
description: Creates light and a small amount of warmth. Helpful for exploring caves.

name: Wrench
description: A tool used to modify toys.

name: Essence of Damage
description: Increase the damage of your weapons and tools.
flavour-text: Once applied, essences cannot be removed or modified

name: Essence of Durability
description: Increase the durability of your weapons and tools.
flavour-text: Once applied, essences cannot be removed or modified

name: Essence of Health
description: Increase the chance of creatures & enemies dropping healing items when using weapons and tools.
flavour-text: Once applied, essences cannot be removed or modified

name: Essence of Luck
description: Increase the chance of dropping extra loot when using weapons and tools.
flavour-text: Once applied, essences cannot be removed or modified

name: Cut Sapphire
description: Crafting material. Refined from Rough Sapphire.

name: Cut Ruby
description: Crafting material. Refined from Rough Ruby

name: Cut Amber
description: Crafting material. Refined from Rough Amber

name: Iron Bar
description: Use for crafting building materials and weapons. Smelted from Iron.

name: Copper Bar
description: Crafting material. Mined from Copper.

name: Glass
description: Crafting material. Made from Sand.
flavour-text: It's clear this is a good material.

name: Silk Fabric
description: Crafting material. Spun from Silk Thread.

name: Wool Fabric
description: Crafting material. Spun from wool thread.

name: Forest Axe: Common
description: A basic stone axe. Perfect for harvesting trees for for self-defense.
flavour-text: Take some trees down a few notches.

name: Forest Axe: Uncommon
description: A sturdy axe made from bone.
flavour-text: Strong enough for chopping down trees... or your enemies

name: Forest Axe: Rare
description: A strong axe crafted from Amber.
flavour-text: Make a few trees and even more enemies fall with one of these

name: Forest Axe: Epic
description: A powerful axe derived from Copper.

name: Pickaxe: Common
description: A basic pickaxe made from Wood. Can harvest stone objects, and is very effective against structures.
flavour-text: Those rocks won't stand a chance.

name: Pickaxe: Uncommon
description: A sturdy pickaxe carved from Bone. Can harvest stone objects, and is very effective against structures.

name: Pickaxe: Rare
description: A strong pickaxer crafted from Flexwood. Can harvest stone objects, and is very effective against structures.
flavour-text: If it's in your way, you can pick it out.

name: Pickaxe: Epic
description: A strong pickaxe crafted from Obsidian. Can harvest stone objects, and is very effective against structures.
flavour-text: Strike for heavy metals with this heavy Pickaxe.

name: Shovel: Common
description: A simple shovel. Ideal for digging up soil.

name: Shovel: Uncommon
description: A sturdy shovel. Ideal for digging up soil.

name: Shovel: Rare
description: A strong shovel. Ideal for digging up soil.

name: Shovel: Epic
description: A powerful shovel. Ideal for digging up soil.

name: Fishing Rod: Common
description: A basic rod that can be used to catch fish

name: Fishing Rod: Uncommon
description: A sturdy rod that can be used to catch fish

name: Fishing Rod: Rare
description: A strong rod that can be used to catch fish

name: Fishing Rod: Epic
description: A powerful rod that can be used to catch fish

name: Granite Slab
description: Used to construct building materials. Harvested from Granite

name: Marble Slab
description: Used for crafting building materials and weapons. Processed from Marble.

name: Obsidian Slab
description: Used for crafting building materials and weapons. Cut from Obsidian.

name: Malachite Slab
description: Used for crafting building materials and weapons. Cut from Malachite.

name: Spicy Burger
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Cold Resistance.
flavour-text: Like a regular burger, but with a little flair.

name: Corn on the Cob
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Stamina regeneration.
flavour-text: Fresh corn, straight from the stalk.

name: Fried Egg
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Stamina regeneration.

name: Grilled Meat
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger

name: Black And Blue Shieldfish Sushi
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger.

name: Simple Sushi
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger

name: Spicy Fish Sandwich
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Cold Resistance
flavour-text: Nothing like some hot fish on a cold day.

name: Health Charm: Common
description: Adds health and defense
flavour-text: Feel a lil' better with a max health boost.

name: Wavebreak Charm: Uncommon
description: Accelerates swimming speed.

name: Illuminator
description: Adds an aura of light in times of darkness. Does not stack with other carried light sources.

name: Hearty Totem: Uncommon
description: When full health, gain bonus health after a few seconds.

name: Health Charm: Uncommon
description: Adds health and defense.
flavour-text: Lift your spirits by amping up your max health.

name: Cool Headed Charm: Uncommon
description: Increases resistance to hot temperatures.
flavour-text: Stay cool when it's too hot.

name: Wavebreak Charm: Rare
description: Accelerates swimming speed.

name: Totem Of The Immortal
description: Revive after taking lethal damage. Destroys itself when used.

name: Regeneration Charm: Rare
description: Regenerates health over time.

name: Inner Fire Charm: Rare
description: Increases resistance to cold temperatures.

name: Hearty Totem: Rare
description: When full health, gain bonus health after a few seconds.

name: Health Charm: Rare
description: Adds health and defense.
flavour-text: Bring your max health to the next level.

name: Good Luck Charm
description: Raises chances of finding rare loot when digging.
flavour-text: Things just seem to work out!

name: Cool Headed Charm: Rare
description: Increases resistance to hot temperatures.

name: Charm Of Resilience: Rare
description: Grants bonus defense for a few seconds after taking damage.

name: Reflection Charm
description: Reflects a moderate amount of damage back to an attacker.

name: Reflection Charm
description: Reflects a moderate amount of damage back to an attacker.

name: Regeneration Charm: Epic
description: Regenerates health over time.

name: Inner Fire Charm: Epic
description: Increases resistance to cold temperatures.
flavour-text: In this case, DON'T chilll out

name: Health Charm: Epic
description: Adds health and defense.
flavour-text: Take your health to the MAX.

name: Charm Of Resilience: Epic
description: Grants bonus defense for a few seconds after taking damage.
flavour-text: The best defense is a good... defense.

name: Flour
description: Use for baking fresh food. Harvested from Wheat Grain.

name: Pepper Seed
description: Plant in a Garden Plot to grow Peppers.

name: Snowberry Seed
description: Plant in a Garden Plot to grow Snowberries.

name: Slapberry Seed
description: Plant in a Garden Plot to grow Slapberries.
flavour-text: Give your stamina a boost... eventually.

name: Corn Kernel
description: Plant in a Garden Plot to grow Corn.
flavour-text: These are bound to get stuck in your teath.

name: Pumpkin Seed
description: Plant in a Garden Plot to grow Pumpkins.

name: Raspberry Seed
description: Plant in a Garden Plot to grow Raspberries.
flavour-text: One small step towards fresh raspberries.

name: Wheat Grain
description: Plant in a Garden Plot to grow Wheat.

name: Bait Bucket: Common
description: Throw this into water to attract fish!

name: Bait Bucket: Uncommon
description: Throw this into water to attract fish!

name: Bait Bucket: Rare
description: Throw this into water to attract fish!

name: Bait Bucket: Epic
description: Throw this into water to attract fish!

name: Snowberry Shake
description: Drink to heal and temporarily increase Heat Resistance
flavour-text: Just don't drink too fast and get a brain freeze!

name: Slap Juice
description: Drink to heal and temporarily increase Stamina regeneration
flavour-text: Feel better and get a quick boost!

name: Slurp Juice
description: Drink to heal over time

name: Fruit Pie
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Stamina regeneration.

name: Pizza
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger

name: Bread
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger

name: Meat Pie
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger
flavour-text: It's meat! It's pie! It's the perfect combo!

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Stamina.

name: Frostpine Rod
description: Use for crafting building materials and weaponns. Carved from Frostpine

name: Flexwood Rod
description: Use for crafting building materials and weaponns. Carved from Wood

name: Knotroot Rod
description: Use for crafting building materials and weaponns. Carved from Knotroot

name: Wooden Rod
description: Use for crafting building materials and weaponns. Carved from Wood

name: Plank
description: Use for crafting building materials and weaponns. Carved from Wood

name: Heavy Wool Thread
description: Crafting material. Spun from Heavy Wool.
flavour-text: Be sure to thank the nearest sheep!

name: Cord
description: Crafting material. Refinded from Vines.
flavour-text: This will really tie things together

name: Drawstring
description: Crafting material. Spun from Cord.
flavour-text: Do NOT let it get into knots!

name: Silk Thread
description: Crafting material. Spun from Silk.

name: Wool Thread
description: Crafting material. Made from Wool.

name: Granite
description: A common stone found in the Grasslands.

name: Sand
description: Can be dug out of the ground in sandy areas with a Shovel.

name: Slurp Mushroom
description: A cooking ingredient commonly found in caves.

name: Soil
description: Can be dug out of the ground with a Shovel.
flavour-text: Gotta plant those seeds in something!

name: Vines
description: Leafy parts often found in bushes and small plants.
flavour-text: Try to get these before the Chickens do!

name: Wheat
description: A cooking ingredient used for making Flour.
flavour-text: Always useful when it comes to cooking.

name: Wood
description: A wood commonly found in the Grasslands.

name: Knotroot
description: A sturdy wood found in Caves.

name: Marble
description: A stone found in the Grasslands Caves.

name: Rough Amber
description: A gem found atop the Dry Valley mesas.

name: Brightcore
description: A shiny stone found in Lava Caves.

name: Copper
description: A metal found in Lava Caves.

name: Flexwood
description: A dry wood found in the Dry Valley.

name: Obsidian
description: A dark stone found in Lava Caves.

name: Rough Ruby
description: A gem found in Lava Caves.
flavour-text: Every jewel starts a little rough.

name: Snow
description: A frosty ingredient used in the coolest recipes.
flavour-text: It's like cold sand you can eat!

name: Frostpine
description: A frosty wood found in the Frostlands.
flavour-text: Brush off all the snow first.

name: Iron
description: A metal found in Frostlands Caves.

name: Malachite
description: An icy gem found in the Frostlands.

name: Rough Sapphire
description: A gem found in the Frostlands.
flavour-text: One step from becoming a crown jewel.

name: Biomass
description: Can be crafted into Power Cells used to power certain toys.

name: Feather
description: A small crafting ingredient often dropped by birds.

name: Fertilizer
description: The leavings of an animal that can be used in farming.

name: Silk
description: A fine silk web often dropped by spiders.

name: Wolf Claw
description: A sharp claw dropped by Wild Wolves.

name: Sand Claw
description: A sharp claw dropped by Sand Wolves.

name: Arctic Claw
description: A sharp claw dropped by Frost Wolves.

name: Wool
description: A crafting ingredient often shed by friendly sheep.
flavour-text: The sheep and helping in their own lil' way.

name: Blast Powder
description: An explosive powder left behind by explosive enemies.
flavour-text: Helpful when making things that make things go BOOM.

name: Bone
description: A sturdy bone often dropped by skeletons.
flavour-text: Hey, they had their chance to use it.

name: Cursed Bone
description: A crafting ingerdient left behind by skeletons.
flavour-text: Those skeletons ONLY have bad bones in their bodies.

name: Brute Scale
description: A scale left behind by fallen Brutes.

name: Sand Brute Scale
description: A scale left behind by fallen Brutes.

name: Frost Brute Scale
description: A scale left behind by fallen Brutes.

name: Shell
description: A crafting ingredient left behind by Rollers.

name: Sand Shell
description: A crafting ingredient left behind by Sand Rollers.
flavour-text: Shake out all the sand first.

name: Frost Shell
description: A crafting ingredient left behind by Frost Rollers.

name: Blast Core
description: A crafting ingredient left behind by Blasters.
flavour-text: Make things go KA-BOOM with a bit of this.

name: Heavy Wool
description: A crafting ingredient sometimes shed by friendly sheep.
flavour-text: Thick like a warm winter coat.

name: Blue Flopper: Common
description: A fish found in cold locations or the ocean. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.
flavour-text: A classic, with stripey blye style.

name: Blue Flopper: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.
flavour-text: A classic, with stripey blye style.

name: Blue Small Fry: Common
description: A small and very common fish. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.
flavour-text: Good things come in fry packages.

name: Blue Small Fry: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.
flavour-text: Good things come in fry packages.

name: Green Flopper: Common
description: A fish found in warm locations or underground. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.
flavour-text: A little green around the gills.

name: Green Flopper: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.
flavour-text: A little green around the gills.

name: Orange Flopper: Common
description: A fish frequently found in many different locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.

name: Orange Flopper: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Black And Blue Shieldfish: Uncommon
description: A fish often found in many different locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.

name: Black And Blue Shieldfish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Cuddle Jellyfish: Uncommon
description: A fish found in the ocean. Can be procressed into Slurp Juice.

name: Cuddle Jellyfish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Purple Thermal Fish: Uncommon
description: A fish often found in hot locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.

name: Purple Thermal Fish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Raven Thermal Fish: Uncommon
description: A fish found in hot locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.
flavour-text: Chilling master of the deep seas.

name: Raven Thermal Fish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.
flavour-text: Chilling master of the deep seas.

name: Silver Thermal Fish: Uncommon
description: A fish found in cold locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.

name: Silver Thermal Fish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Slurp Jellyfish: Uncommon
description: A fish found in the ocean. Can be processed into Slurp Juice.

name: Slurp Jellyfish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Blue Slurpfish: Rare
description: A fish found in different underground locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets and Slurp Juice.

name: Blue Slurpfish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Molten Spicy Fish: Rare
description: A fish found in very hot locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets.
flavour-text: Puts a real pep in your step.

name: Molten Spicy Fish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.
flavour-text: Puts a real pep in your step.

name: Purple Slurpfish: Rare
description: A fish found underground or in the mountains. Can be processed into Fish Fillets and Slurp Juice.
flavour-text: They don't make this flavour of Slurp anymore.

name: Purple Slurpfish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.
flavour-text: They don't make this flavour of Slurp anymore.

name: Yellow Slurpfish: Rare
description: A fish found underground or in warm locations. Can be processed into Fish Fillets and Slurp Juice.

name: Yellow Slurpfish: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Vendetta Flopper: Epic
description: A fish found in different locations including underground. Can be processed into Fish Fillets

name: Vendetta Flopper: Legendary
description: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.

name: Fish Fillet
description: A nutritious piece of meat. Can be processed from fish.

name: Smoked Fry Fish
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger.
flavour-text: A little fishy. A lot delicious.

name: Ice Cream
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger. Heals more in hot temperatures, less in cold.

name: Spicy Ice Cream
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Cold Resistance. Heals more in hot temperatures, less in cold.
flavour-text: It's cold AND hot. A delicious paradox!

name: Snowberry Ice Cream
description: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Cold Resistance. Heals more in hot temperatures, less in cold.

name: Corn
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger.

name: Egg
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger.

name: Meat
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger. Much better when cooked.

description: Drink to heal and reduce Hunger.

name: Pumpkin
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger.

name: Raspberry
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger.

name: Slap Berry
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Stamina regeneration.

name: Spicy Pepper
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Cold Resistance.

name: Cheese
description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger.

description: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger, and temporarily increase Heat Resistance.
